.
Fees Charged for Requested Evidence
VA is
not
authorized to pay a fee for copies of public documents or other evidence from Federal, State, or local agencies or private sources.
Most custodians of public documents furnish copies to VA free of charge. However, if payment of a fee is required to obtain a document
advise the claimant that VA is
not
authorized to pay the fee, and
provide the claimant with information on how to secure the document.
